title: Love Island teases a self-confessed 'ditzy' blonde named Jessie in a new trailer
text:
With the latest season of Love Island starting in just a matter of days, fans of the show are being slowly introduced to this year's cast.

And the latest contestant to be revealed is a 23-year-old waitress from Tasmania, known simply as Jessie.

In a short video posted to Love Island's Instagram page, the buxom blonde confessed: 'I come across as really ditzy.'

Scroll down for video

Coming soon: A new Love Island teaser trailer has been released, introducing fans to a 23-year-old waitress from Tasmania, known simply as Jessie

But she claimed she's a lot brighter than people give her credit for.

'I do have a lot of blonde moments, however I'm not as dumb as I come across,' she added.

Jessie said she also has a penchant for bad boys, and is 'looking for a man to give her attention and no other girls'.

First impressions: In a short video posted to Love Island's Instagram page, the buxom blonde confessed: 'I come across as really ditzy'

'I go for the players, I get hurt, and then I sook about it,' she confessed, adding, 'There's just something attractive about them.'

Showing off her fit physique in a hot pink bikini, Jessie added: 'Surely someone will fall in love with me.'

In an interview with Who magazine last month, the show's host, Sophie Monk teased what fans can expect from the upcoming season of the hit dating show.

'I do have a lot of blonde moments, however I'm not as dumb as I come across,' she said, claiming she has a penchant for bad boys

The 39-year-old claimed this year's show - set to start on Channel Nine on October 7 - will be 'insane'.

'There will be a few surprises where a couple might be getting comfortable and they'll be tested to see if they last. It sounds harsh, but it's just like real life,' she said.

And she added if she could give the contestants any advice, it would be to just be themselves.

What a tease: In an interview with Who magazine last month, the show's host, Sophie Monk, teased what fans can expect from the upcoming season of the hit dating show

'It sounds so cliche but you have to be yourself. The real you is always revealed anyway, like, you can only hold up for so long,' she said.

'You are in an environment where you're in front of 60 cameras and microphones. It's going to come out.

'Just own it. If you are an a***hole, be an a***hole. If you are nice, be nice. Just own it!'
description: With the latest season of Love Island starting in just a matter of days, fans of the show are being slowly introduced to this year's cast. The latest contestant is a 23-year-old waitress known simply as Jessie.
authors: Demeter Stamell For Daily Mail Australia
